content: When he’s got some range on you, listen up for some of his call-outs. If he yells “Storm forth!” he’ll soon create a gusty orb surrounded by leaves that will slowly float toward you. This one can’t be deflected since it won’t do damage on its own. Once it reaches your position, the gust will issue forth and in a moment become a small violent tornado that will knock you down!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Guangmou.md', within the main section titled 'Guangmou', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Guangmou' and the sub-subsection 'Guangmou Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
When he’s got some range on you, listen up for some of his call-outs. If he yells “Storm forth!” he’ll soon create a gusty orb surrounded by leaves that will slowly float toward you. This one can’t be deflected since it won’t do damage on its own. Once it reaches your position, the gust will issue forth and in a moment become a small violent tornado that will knock you down!
